entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
